name: Spider City (Zultry)
description:
This city ain't big enough for two cowboys... It's only big enough for lots of spiders! The citispins of Spider City have got themselves into a web of trouble. You're in for a web of thrills, passion, mystery, puzzles and webs in this story-driven action game.

Created for the [Absurdist game jam]

Made by Amy and also Ed

Original soundtrack composed by Amy
